item.title: Add Mockaroo
item.description: https://mockaroo.com/ - Mockaroo lets you generate realistic test data in CSV, JSON, SQL, and Excel formats. You can also create mocks for back-end API.

item.title: Added in free plan limits
item.description: https://www.sofodata.com/ - Create secure RESTful APIs from CSV files. Upload a CSV file and instantly access the data via its API allowing faster application development. Free plan includes 2 APIs and 2,500 API calls per month. No credit card required.

item.title: Added Sofodata
item.description: https://www.sofodata.com/ - Create secure RESTful APIs from CSV files. Upload a CSV file and instantly access the data via its API allowing faster application development.

item.title: Add Qase to testing section
item.description: https://qase.io - Test management system for Dev and QA teams. Manage test cases, compose test runs, perform test runs, track defects and measure impact. The free tier includes all core features, with 500Mb available for attachments and up to 3 users.

item.title: Added pony.icu in the web hosting section
item.description: https://pony.icu/ - Free Web Hosting with Unlimited Disk Space, Unlimited Bandwidth and Unlimited Websites from PonyICU. PHP and MySQL included.

item.title: Update txti.es to https link
item.description: https://txti.es/ - Quickly create web pages with markdown.
